email_group_1.subject: Urgent: reset your account now
email_group_1.desc: We detected a login from an unknown device. Click the link to verify immediately.
email_group_1.explain: Fake domain and urgency. IT will never ask you to verify through email links.

email_group_1.subject: Weekly update from HR
email_group_1.desc: Here’s the HR weekly digest with upcoming events and training reminders.
email_group_1.explain: Legitimate HR update from your company domain, no odd links.

email_group_2.subject: Invoice due today
email_group_2.desc: Your invoice is overdue. Please process the attached file immediately.
email_group_2.explain: Vendor name misspelled and urgency tactic. Avoid unexpected invoice attachments.

email_group_2.subject: Lunch order form
email_group_2.desc: Choose your lunch preference for Friday’s team meeting.
email_group_2.explain: Internal office email with a casual tone and predictable context.

email_group_3.subject: DocuSign signature request
email_group_3.desc: Please review and sign this document within 2 hours.
email_group_3.explain: Look-alike DocuSign domain (‘.co’) and fake urgency.

email_group_3.subject: System maintenance notice
email_group_3.desc: We’ll perform scheduled maintenance tonight from 11 PM to 1 AM.
email_group_3.explain: Routine IT maintenance from your official company domain.

email_group_4.subject: CEO request
email_group_4.desc: Are you available? I need a quick favor—please reply now.
email_group_4.explain: CEO impersonation and urgency. Genuine executives use internal channels.

email_group_4.subject: Quarterly results deck
email_group_4.desc: Attached is the final deck for tomorrow’s quarterly meeting.
email_group_4.explain: Expected report from a known finance team member.

email_group_5.subject: Mailbox full: increase storage
email_group_5.desc: Your mailbox is 98% full. Click here to increase your quota.
email_group_5.explain: External domain pretending to be IT helpdesk. Never click links like these.

email_group_5.subject: Printer maintenance
email_group_5.desc: Printer maintenance scheduled for 4 PM. Please use the north wing printer until then.

email_group_6.subject: Payment details changed
email_group_6.desc: New banking details are attached. Update your records immediately.
email_group_6.explain: Unfamiliar domain and urgency to update payment info.

email_group_6.subject: Holiday schedule
email_group_6.desc: Attached is the upcoming holiday calendar for Q2.
email_group_6.explain: Expected internal HR message with predictable timing.

email_group_7.subject: VPN suspended
email_group_7.desc: Your VPN has been disabled. Re-activate by logging in here.
email_group_7.explain: External domain with fake VPN login prompt.

email_group_7.subject: Team meeting invite
email_group_7.desc: Please accept the recurring meeting invite for project updates.
email_group_7.explain: Normal calendar request from a known internal address.

email_group_8.subject: CSR event signup
email_group_8.desc: Join our monthly volunteering drive. Reply if interested.
email_group_8.explain: Internal CSR request with simple instructions.

email_group_8.subject: Payroll verification
email_group_8.desc: We couldn’t process your payment. Click here to verify details.
email_group_8.explain: Misspelled payroll domain asking to verify through email link.

email_group_9.subject: Wellness webinar
email_group_9.desc: Register for next week’s 30-minute wellness session.

email_group_9.subject: Anti-virus alert
email_group_9.desc: Your system is infected. Run the attached cleaner now.
email_group_9.explain: External domain and attachment-based cleaner—classic malware delivery.

email_group_10.subject: Office365 alert: password expires
email_group_10.desc: Your password expires in 30 minutes. Click here to renew.
email_group_10.explain: Spoofed Microsoft domain and urgency—do not click.

email_group_10.subject: Desk booking reminder
email_group_10.desc: Please reserve your desk for next week by Friday 5 PM.
email_group_10.explain: Routine internal reminder, no external links.

email_group_11.subject: Urgent: Update Your Payroll Information
email_group_11.desc: Please click the link to verify your payroll details to avoid delays in your next payment.
email_group_11.explain: The sender's domain is suspiciously similar to a legitimate one, and it creates a sense of urgency.

email_group_11.subject: Quarterly Performance Review Schedule
email_group_11.desc: Your performance review is scheduled for next week. Please check the calendar for details.
email_group_11.explain: The email is from a legitimate company domain and contains no urgent requests or suspicious links.

email_group_12.subject: Action Required: Invoice Payment Overdue
email_group_12.desc: Your invoice is overdue. Please download the attached invoice and process the payment immediately.

email_group_13.subject: Security Alert: Unusual Login Attempt
email_group_13.desc: We've detected a login attempt from an unrecognized device. Click here to secure your account.

email_group_13.subject: Monthly IT Maintenance Schedule
